item.title: Java function() to do with webdesign
item.dc:creator: @cows1471 cows1471
item.description:
@cows1471 wrote:

If you know what your doing, have this

function UpdateNavigation()
{
 if ( idUpdateNavigation != 0 )
 {
  clearTimeout( idUpdateNavigation );
  idUpdateNavigation = 0;
 }
 nUpdateNavigation++;treeItemSelected = 1;
 var topframe = GetFrame( "mainframe", top );
 if ( navUpdated == 0 && topframe &&
  typeof( topframe.SelectCurrentMenuItem ) == 'function' )
 {
  navUpdated = 1;topframe.SelectCurrentMenuItem( "menu_portfolio" );topframe.SelectCurrentLocation( "ePortfolio", currentPathFromHome );}if ( ( treeItemSelected == 0 || navUpdated == 0 ) &&
  ( nUpdateNavigation < 10 ) ) 
 {
  idUpdateNavigation = window.setTimeout( "UpdateNavigation()", 500 );
 }
}
